LightningComponentBundle.description: Form review page component for displaying user responses before submission, following Ontario Design System guidelines.

property.name: heading
property.label: Page Heading
property.description: Main heading for the review page (e.g., Review your answers)

property.name: subheading
property.label: Subheading
property.default: Please review your answers before submitting.

property.name: sectionsJson
property.label: Sections (JSON)
property.description: JSON array of sections. Each section has: heading, headingActionLabel, headingActionUrl, items (array of {key, value, changeUrl, changeLabel}), ratio

property.name: cancelUrl
property.label: Cancel URL
property.description: URL to navigate to when cancel is clicked

property.name: showSubmitWarning
property.label: Show Submit Warning
property.description: Display a warning message before the submit button

property.name: submitWarningMessage
property.label: Submit Warning Message
property.description: Warning message to display when Show Submit Warning is enabled
property.default: Once you submit, you will not be able to make changes.
